simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes a single software bus command pipe message. Checks the message and command IDs and calls the appropriate routine to handle the message.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes an on-board sample actionpoints request message.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: This message does not affect the command execution counter

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes an on-board housekeeping request message.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: This message does not affect the command execution counter

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes a noop ground command.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para:
Processes a reset counters ground command which will reset the following LC application counters to zero:
Command counter
Command error counter
Actionpoint sample counter
Monitored message counter
RTS execution counter
Passive RTS execution counter

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Utility function that resets housekeeping counters to zero

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes a set LC application state ground command.

simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Utility function that resets selected entries in actionpoint results table

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: Start of area to reset (base zero)
End of area to reset (base zero)
Reset AP stats command does not reset all fields

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Utility function that resets selected entries in watchpoint results table

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: Start of area to reset (base zero)
End of area to reset (base zero)
Reset WP stats command does not reset all fields

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Checks if the actual length of a software bus message matches the expected length and sends an error event if a mismatch occures

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message
The expected length of the message based upon the command code

entry.para: Returns TRUE if the length is as expected
Returns FALSE if the length is not as expected

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function updates the CDS areas containing the watchpoint results table, the actionpoint results table and the LC application global data.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None
